General.Name: Ramssol Group Bhd
General.Description: Ramssol Group Berhad, an investment holding company, provides human resource solutions in Malaysia, Thailand, and Indonesia. It offers human capital and student management solutions to local and foreign organizations, as well as educational institutions; and IT staff augmentation, and technical support and maintenance services. The company also provides Feet's, an employee engagement platform for employees to continue being engaged socially; and Lark, an online platform that enables businesses to connect various communication functions and work roles. In addition, it engages in the provision of software development and advisory services; computer programming activities; research and development on information communication technology; education information technology program and applications; and knowledge process outsourcing and conducting courses and seminars. Further,the company offers internet services related to mobile application, electronic commerce, information systems integration, and administration; management consulting services for enterprises; human resource consultancy services to corporate clients; and information technology consultancy services. Ramssol Group Berhad was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Cyberjaya, Malaysia.
